resources.string: Results will appear here after a successful scan using the button below
This app requires camera access to identify surrounding objects. Please click grant permissions button below if you\'d like to continue.
1. First tap the appropriate radio button to select between scene labeling and text recognition.
2. To begin scanning, simply point your camera towards a scene of piece of text and tap on the scan button near the bottom of the screen.
3. Once the objects or text are identified, the result will be dropped on screen just above the scan button and additionally read aloud based on your preferences in the settings section.
That\'s all for the tutorial. Please go back and enjoy!
